system.effect: Whilst the Character is in a Frenzy, whenever an enemy inflicts Critical Damage on an ally or hits a comrade within 10 metres of the Character, they can increase their Unnatural Strength and Toughness Traits by +1 until the end of the encounter. These traits cannot exceed +8 each.
